Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is less personal and can be harder to guide for a feedback, whereas a teacher is the “wiser” one and can guide the feedback process, in other words they are better and tell you the unknown unknown regarding what you are lacking.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Teacher more personal
GenAI has no judgement

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI can be more thorough, teacher tends to know of the unknown unknowns and can provide feedback for areas you didn’t even know could need improvement.
